    PrefixFileHandleResolver
    FileHandleResolver that adds a prefix to the filename before passing it to the base resolver.
    ResolutionFileResolver
    This FileHandleResolver uses a given list of ResolutionFileResolver.Resolutions to determine the best match based on the current Screen size.
